thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com
thread.title: Charisse

author: Charisse
title: Charisse
text: I've used SSENSE several times over the past 3.5 years. I recommend the site to any Canadians looking for designer goods before they check out traditional high-end websites based in the US or Europe. It's a fresh, edgy, and non-intimidating option for finding classic and current luxury items. They're well-stocked with familiar big names, but offer products from great independent designers too. My deliveries always arrive quicker than expected and whenever I've had to make a return, the process is pretty seamless. They also have AMAZING sales.
